content: Turn and face the opposite direction and deal with the archer on the stairs to the right first. Climb up the stairs to reach a wooden structure, where you can find the first Meditation Spot of the Chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Camp of Seasons' and the sub-subsection 'Tip!'.
The content is as follows:
Turn and face the opposite direction and deal with the archer on the stairs to the right first. Climb up the stairs to reach a wooden structure, where you can find the first Meditation Spot of the Chapter.
